title: Andy Warhol, David Hockney, Henry Geldzahler and Jeff Goodman from "Out of the 60's" from The Geldzahler Portfolio
medium: Offset lithograph from a portfolio of three lithographs, two etchings (one with aquatint), two screenprints, one digital print, one offset lithograph, one solar plate intaglio, and one video transfer
credits: Gift of Agnes Gund and Daniel Shapiro
